lines.i: A collection vital signs observations For any observation within the organizer, if the NEMSIS value is "Refused," the value SHALL be "NI;" the string "Refused" MAY be recorded in Observation.text. Note that NEMSIS collects times at the vitals cluster level, whereas systems may record them at the observation level. No preference is indicated regarding how close individual observation timestamps must be to allow their inclusion in a cluster or how the cluster effectiveTime is determined. effectiveTime is modeled on the observations to support unanticipated uses and to conform more closely to the Consolidated CDA pattern, though the exclusion of the id property makes it impossible to assert compliance to the Consolidated template in this guide (though it remains possible to do so in an implementation).

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.28"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10257)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:11078)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Systolic Blood Pressure (CONF:11077)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:11080)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Diastolic Blood Pressure (CONF:11079)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:11082)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Heart Rate (CONF:11081)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:11084)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Respiratory Rate (CONF:11083)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:11086)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Body Temperature (CONF:11085)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component {subsets Organizer::component} (CONF:11090)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Oxygen Saturation (CONF:11087)

SHALL contain [1..1] component (CONF:11335)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Prior Aid Vitals (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.29)

This component MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11134)

body.codeblock: <organizer xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.28"/> <code code="46680005" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT" displayName="Vital signs"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2015"/> <high value="2015"/> </effectiveTime> <component> <observation> <code code="16984200"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2015"/> <high value="2015"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="PQ"/> <methodCode code="512596464"/> </observation> </component> <component> <observation> <code code="704697780"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2015"/> <high value="2015"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="PQ"/> <methodCode code="2006982620"/> </observation> </component> <component> <observation> <code code="1437665602"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2015"/> <high value="2015"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="PQ"/> </observation> </component> <component> <observation> <code code="372862723"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2015"/> <high value="2015"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="PQ"/> </observation> </component> <component> <observation> <code code="1830773257"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2015"/> <high value="2015"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="PQ"/> </observation> </component> <component> <observation> <code code="1165723131"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2015"/> <high value="2015"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="PQ"/> </observation> </component> <component> <observation moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.29"/> <code code="67518-1" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Obtained prior to units EMS care NEMSIS"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2015"/> <high value="2015"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </component> <component> <organizer/> </component> </organizer>
